title: Interpretation of seeing a silhouette or shadow of someone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing someone’s shadow or shadow in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a shadow chasing me in a dream, shadow or shadow is the darkness or darkness caused by the body when it blocks the light. Field of vision. Interpretation of seeing a shadow in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a shadow or silhouette in a dream always indicates a lack of confidence and fear of the unknown. When you see a shadow or silhouette in a dream, you sit on it and feel cold. It indicates the dreamer’s need for money badly. To see yourself sitting in the shadow or in Imagination and you feel safe and comfortable. It indicates the end of worries and the end of problems and sorrows. You see yourself emerging from the shadows or imagination emerging from the shadow or from imagination into the sun. It indicates positive changes in the dreamer’s life and his transformation from poverty to wealth. To see yourself sitting in a shadow or shadow in black appears That something bad will happen to the pioneer. Seeing yourself sitting in the shade in a white color in a dream indicates goodness and wealth. Seeing yourself walking over shadows in a dream indicates the ability to face life’s problems and overcome difficulties. Interpretation of seeing shadows in a dream for a single woman: Seeing one girl sitting in the shadow in Dreaming about resting indicates the approach of her marriage to a rich and important person. Seeing women sitting alone under the shade of a tree resting in a dream, this indicates the collapse of problems, worries, and sorrow. Seeing an unmarried woman sitting under the shade and feeling very cold in a dream, this indicates her need for affection and love. Interpretation of a woman’s vision A married woman sees shadows in a dream. Seeing a married woman sitting in the shade and feeling comfortable in it, this indicates the intensity of her love and respect for her husband and her relationship with him. Seeing a married woman sitting in the shade and unable to see anything in the dream, this indicates the instability of her marital life as a result of constant disagreements with her husband. Interpretation of seeing a black shadow In a dream, seeing the dreamer’s black silhouette in the dream and feeling afraid about it indicates that the fortuneteller is being harmed by the jinn and is obliged to comply with the dhikr and the legal ruqyah. To see yourself sitting in the shade or imagining in a deserted place mentions the term closest to the forerunner. Seeing the silhouette dancing or having fun indicates negligence in religion to the viewer. Interpretation of seeing a shadow or shadow following me in a dream. Seeing a shadow or shadow in a dream following the divine. It indicates that the dreamer has many doubts about some things in his life. Seeing the silhouette of an animal that the dreamer sees in the dream is a message of information and warning that something bad will happen to him. Interpretation of seeing a white shadow in Seeing a white shadow in a dream indicates goodness and food for the viewer. A white shadow in a dream symbolizes good news coming to the dreamer. Seeing a white shadow in a dream is good news for the return of an absent or traveler. Interpretation of seeing a shadow in a dream according to Nablus: Seeing a shadow in a dream and sitting on it indicates blessings, kindness, and food. Or the shadow of a person in a dream of a bachelor or an unmarried woman. It indicates good news of a close marriage and emotional stability. Seeing a shadow in a dream and feeling very cold in a dream indicates many problems and fears that the viewer is exposed to. Interpretation of the vision

title: Interpretation of number 15 in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of the number 15 in a dream by Ibn Sirin, there is no doubt that there are many dreams that cause confusion, and among these dreams is seeing numbers in a dream, where numbers are often used, and apart from this, the work of numerology is not carried out without the use of numbers , as each person has his favorite number, but if these numbers flow in a dream or carry associations or interpretations, we will learn all of this by presenting the interpretation of the number 15 in a dream by Ibn Sirin in the article.Interpretation of the number 15 according to Ibn Sirin. In reality, there is no interpretation of visions. And dreams except with reference to the opinions of major dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin. As for his opinions on seeing the number 15, we will explain them as follows: The translator Ibn Sirin stated that seeing the number 15 in a dream indicates a path accompanied by difficulties, problems, and obstacles. Moreover, what the dreamer must do is return to God Almighty and ask Him for help. One of the connotations of seeing the number 15, according to Ibn Sirin, is that whoever sees it is already suffering from financial hardship. All he has to do is be patient, trust in God, and be optimistic. In addition, seeing the number 15 indicates that you are suffering from anxiety, fear, and tension in life. In a way In general, seeing the number 15 in a dream is considered an unpleasant vision, and therefore it is an unlucky vision. See also: Interpretation of dream number 90 in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing the number 15 in a dream by Al-NabulsiBeside the great translator Ibn Sirin, the great scholar Al-Nabulsi also excelled in the field of dream interpretation And we will learn about his opinions on seeing the number 15 through the following lines: Imam Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing the number 15 in a dream is a vision worthy of praise and deserving of it. Seeing the number 15 from Al-Nabulsi’s point of view reflects happiness, affection, and love with a partner. While this vision for a bachelor’s degree means psychological comfort. As for For married, pregnant and divorced women, this vision shows the blessing in their lives. There is no doubt that seeing the number 15 is one of the visions that indicate goodness and blessing. In addition, one of the meanings of this vision with regard to marriage is that this marriage is successful on the basis of love, happiness and stability. Interpretation of the number 15 In a dream by Ibn SirinSee also: Numbers in a dream Interpretation of seeing numbers in a dream Seeing number 15 for a married woman A woman always tries to find ways to calm and calm down in her life with her family, so when a certain vision is objected to, such as seeing the number 15, in a dream, she tries to find out its interpretation and interpretation. . Vision, and we will present this interpretation as follows: In general, seeing odd numbers in a married woman’s dream symbolizes her desire to achieve her hopes and desires. Seeing the number 15 is one of the visions that expresses and refers to good things. This vision carries an indication that The vibrant life of a woman continues in a successful, stable and happy way. While seeing the fifteenth day in a dream for a married woman indicates her closeness to pregnancy, God willing. Thus, the

title: What is the interpretation of going for Hajj in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Going for Hajj in a dream: Seeing going for Hajj in a dream is undoubtedly one of the best dreams that a person can have in his life. ...So follow usGoing for Hajj in a dreamSeeing Hajj in a dream, and what a vision that brings a lot of good news and benefits that the dreamer will receive in his life. The interpretation of a dream about Hajj explains that fate brings to the dreamer a set of good things that he sees in his world. If he sees If a merchant sees in a dream that he is going for Hajj, it is interpreted that the dreamer will obtain many good things and will receive his share of large profits in the coming period. When a sick person sees himself going for Hajj in a dream, it symbolizes a speedy recovery, the return of health, and getting rid of the disease that has exhausted the dreamer for a long time. If an unmarried young man sees in a dream that he is going for Hajj, this means that the dreamer will get married soon. When a person who insisted on praying to God to fulfill his desires sees that he has gone for Hajj in a dream, this indicates that the Lord has heard his prayer and will obtain all the good things he desires. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he will perform Hajj on his feet, it is interpreted that there is an oath he has made and he must fulfill it. When a person dreams that he is going for Hajj by car, this is a good sign of the help and facilitation with which God is honoring him in all his affairs. Complete the secrets of dream interpretation from Google. Which includes thousands of interpretations that you are looking for. Hajj in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin says that seeing a dream about Hajj tells us that many good things will happen to the pioneer in his life and that he will have a great relationship in the future. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is going for Hajj, it is interpreted that he is a good, easy-going person. He is on the straight path and wants to reach his great position with the Lord - the Almighty - and is trying to get closer. To him is obedience and good deeds. The scholar Ibn Sirin pointed out that seeing a traveler performing Hajj and returning in a traveler’s dream means that he will return to his homeland soon and God will honor him with his virtuous return after he lost hope in him. If the dreamer is in debt and sees that he is going for Hajj in a dream, this indicates that he will get rid of From this financial crisis soon and God will save him from the dangers of debt by his will and he will have a lot. Good things that will happen in his life after that. Going for Hajj in a dream for a single woman. Seeing going for Hajj in a dream for an unmarried woman means that this girl is of good character, avoids doubt, and is trying to walk on the right path, and God will honor her with a gift and a good condition according to His will. If she sees the unmarried woman in The dream is that she is going for Hajj, so it is interpreted that the Almighty will honor her by fulfilling her dreams and wishes, and granting her a lot of goodness and satisfaction in her life. When a fiancée dreams that she is going for Hajj, this means that the dreamer will get married soon and that her fiancé is a good person with good behavior who will protect her and help her in life. If she sees a woman in a dream That she went for Hajj and drank Zamzam water, this is a wonderful sign that she will go to a man who has a prominent position in society and with him she will live beautiful days in care and protection. God. The mind

title: Interpretation of the dream of entering ihram in a dream and its interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of Ihram in a dream: Ihram is a Muslim’s determination and willingness to perform the Hajj obligation in obedience to God Almighty and in imitation of our Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. Mecca Al-Mukarramah, in terms of the second chapter, relates to the place where the pilgrim intends to perform the Hajj obligation. There are clothes for women and men and the interpretation of the dream of Ihram in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of Ihram in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Among his interpretations, Ibn Sirin shows the signs that indicate many dreams, including the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. To dream of ihram in a dream. If he sees an unmarried woman wearing ihram clothes in his dream, this indicates the approaching engagement of his engagement. Also, if the dreamer is married, this indicates the presence of dryness and distance between the spouses and major disagreements. It also symbolizes the dreamer’s distance from sin or anything contrary to religion. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing tamarind with details from Ibn Sirin and Al-NabulsiInterpretation of a dream about ihram in a dream for menIhram in a dream is one of the dreams that often indicates goodness. The interpretation of a dream about ihram for a man has many connotations, such as: This dream symbolizes comfort and reassurance for the person, and that God will grant him many good things and bless them. It also indicates the dreamer’s closeness to God and his distance from forbidden things. On the other hand, if the dreamer owes money to others and sees this The dream portends for him some comfort and the release of his money. In addition, it also indicates the return of his marital life to the right track and its safety after many disagreements and heartaches. But if the man sees this dream alone or separately, and his appearance in this The dress is attractive, so this gives him good news about a woman who will help him in this world and will reward him. Likewise, if he sees in a dream that he is wearing Ihram clothing and is satisfied with it, this indicates his high status among the people in his life. Seeing Ihram clothing in a dream Ihram clothing is special clothing for men or women. To perform the rituals of Hajj or Umrah, and seeing Ihram clothing in a dream has symbols, which are: Ihram clothing in a dream other than the time of Hajj symbolizes the poverty of men, unlike women, which symbolizes changing their lives for the better. It also indicates the end of the viewer’s accumulated debts. Perhaps it is good news that He will perform Hajj. And if the fortuneteller becomes ill and sees the Hajj dress, he will be happy to see that he will recover soon. On the other hand, if someone he knows sees that he is sick and sees him in a dream wearing the Ihram dress and his health behind him, this indicates the death of the sick person. Also, if he sees himself wearing the Ihram dress and is surprised With it, it indicates his salvation from his many debts. In general, this vision indicates that life has progressed and changed for the better, and the arrival of many pleasant events in his life. See also: Interpretation of dreams about crossing a busy road and its consequences. Wearing the ihram in a dream for a married woman. Wearing the ihram in a dream for a married woman symbolizes Many people, including God’s satisfaction with her, a good marital relationship, and other interpretations, such as: This dream shows a married woman that there are difficulties she is going through, but their end is near. It also indicates God’s satisfaction with her, and that

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a groom in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of seeing a groom in a dream, seeing a groom in a dream can indicate a girl’s marriage. Many of us have questions about seeing the groom in a dream and do not find a suitable explanation for this. The dream of seeing a groom in a dream: For someone who sees that he is the groom and marries a Jewish bride in a dream, this means that he falls into sins and misdeeds and hinders his parents. A married woman seeing her groom proposing in a dream is evidence that her condition will change for the better. Today we will explain the interpretation of seeing the groom in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of the groom by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing the groom in a dream, as Ibn Sirin explained, indicates promotion in business and also shows power and influence. Seeing an unknown bride and groom In a dream, this is an undesirable dream and indicates death. A person dreams that he is the groom and marries a Christian bride in a dream, and this indicates that he is searching for illusions and it does not benefit him. A dream of seeing a groom in a dream for someone who sees that he is a groom and marries a Jewish bride in a dream, this means that he He falls into sins and sins and hinders his parents. Dreaming of seeing a groom marrying a dead woman in a dream is evidence that he will get something that is difficult to obtain. Interpretation of a dream about a groomThe interpretation of seeing a groom and joy in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence that she will achieve what she wants and aspires to. The dream that The groom saw a single girl and was sad in a dream, which is evidence that he is making a lot of mistakes and needs to rethink what he is doing. The dream of laughing at the groom and the unmarried girl is evidence that an inappropriate person will propose to her and she will regret it if she gets married. Interpretation of the groom’s vision for a married woman: A dream of seeing a groom in a married woman’s dream is a sign of good news for her and her family. Seeing a married woman in a dream marrying the groom she knows is evidence of increasing money and the success of her husband’s projects and benefiting from them. A dream of seeing a groom in a dream: A married woman seeing that her groom proposes marriage in a dream is evidence However, her situation will change for the better. Interpretation of dreams to see a groom and a wedding accompanied by dancing and singing in a dream for a married woman. Evidence that there is a big problem for her or one of her children. Interpretation of a dream about a groom for a pregnant woman. A dream to see a son-in-law in a dream. A son-in-law in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that she will give birth to a son. A vision A groom in a dream for a pregnant woman means that her birth will be easy. It also reassures her and the safety of her unborn child. Interpretation of a dream about a groom for a divorced woman: Dreaming of seeing a son-in-law in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a son-in-law in a divorced woman’s dream is an indication that she will marry someone who will compensate her for everything. Seeing a groom present for a divorced woman in her dream is evidence that her life will change for the better. The symbol of the groom in a dream. If a man sees in his dream that he has become a groom, this indicates that he will be promoted to a position or that he will obtain a higher position. A sick person seeing that he is a groom and that the bride is unknown Or dead, means his end is approaching. Dreaming of seeing a groom in a dream. Seeing a groom in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the goodness of her life and achieving what she wants. Seeing a groom in a dream

Interpretation of a dream about a groom for a pregnant woman. A dream to see a son-in-law in a dream. A son-in-law in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that she will give birth to a son. A vision A groom in a dream for a pregnant woman means that her birth will be easy. It also reassures her and the safety of her unborn child. Interpretation of a dream about a groom for a divorced woman: Dreaming of seeing a son-in-law in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a son-in-law in a divorced woman’s dream is an indication that she will marry someone who will compensate her for everything. Seeing a groom present for a divorced woman in her dream is evidence that her life will change for the better. The symbol of the groom in a dream. If a man sees in his dream that he has become a groom, this indicates that he will be promoted to a position or that he will obtain a higher position. A sick person seeing that he is a groom and that the bride is unknown Or dead, means his end is approaching. Dreaming of seeing a groom in a dream. Seeing a groom in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the goodness of her life and achieving what she wants. Seeing a groom in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the following lines, we present to you the interpretation of a dream about shaving by Ibn Sirin for a married girl and an unmarried man, then we show you through the encyclopedia website the interpretation of a dream about shaving by the scholar Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair by Ibn Sirin: If the dreamer sees himself cutting his hair on the first day of the month of Dhu al-Hijjah, this is a sign of... Justice in this world and atonement for sins. If the dreamer sees that he is cutting his hair during the holy months, this is a sign of his surrendering his worries, relieving his pain, and paying his debt. If a woman sees that her hair has fallen out, this is a sign of the death of her husband or someone close to her. When a woman sees That she cuts part of her hair, this indicates the emergence of some marital problems in her home. If a woman sees in her dream that her hair has been pulled out from the roots, this indicates that she expects destruction. And if he sees that his hair has never fallen from his head, then this is a warning against disobedience to his parents and lack of Justice. If the dreamer is bald and hair appears in his dream, this is a sign of the coming of glory, greatness, and abundance of sustenance. If the dreamer sees that he is plucking hair from his body in the dream, this means that he is wasting his money and spoiling it. But if he sees that he is plucking from his armpit, this is a sign. On Saladin and the world, and in another narration that he will get what he wants. Seeing a haircut in a single woman’s dream. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is cutting her hair, this is a sign that she is dissatisfied with her appearance. When an unmarried girl sees her hair cut in a dream, this is a warning. To her that she is facing a health problem. Cutting hair in a dream for an unmarried woman shows her desire to change her life for the better and work on her future. If an unmarried woman sees that her hair is long in a dream and she cuts it, this is a sign that she has lost someone who cares for her, and long hair in a dream indicates the presence of Security and love, and when cutting it indicates the loss of a person who represents a source of security in life. But if an unmarried girl sees that she is cutting her hair to look beautiful and she is completely satisfied with it, this is a sign that her engagement will collapse in the near future and God will compensate her with someone better than him. Seeing a girl in a dream That someone cuts her hair means that there are many around her who do not want her to do well and have bad intentions, in addition to feeling betrayed, betrayed, and insecure around her. The amount of hair cut in a woman’s dream represents the changes that will occur in her life. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a woman Married: If a married woman sees her hair being shaved, this is evidence of her husband’s death or separation from him. In general, seeing love being cut off in a married woman’s dream indicates the occurrence of problems between the spouses, such as separation and travel, or abandonment and marriage to another woman, or someone inviting her husband to another woman. Other. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that her hair is being cut in a dream, this is good news that will eliminate anxiety and save her from the suffering and pain of pregnancy. If a pregnant woman sees that she is cutting her hair, but it is still long and beautiful, then this is good news that she will give birth to a female. But When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she cuts her hair and it becomes very short, this means...

If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream holding her breasts, this may represent marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my aunt’s divorce in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my aunt’s divorce in a dream may lead to the problems you face, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a divorce and her aunt’s crying, it may indicate the troubles she faces, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees her aunt’s divorce in a dream, this may be evidence of the pressure the aunt is experiencing, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If a divorced woman sees a divorce and cries in a dream, this may be a sign of worries and sorrows that control her aunt, and God knows best. title: Does an envious person see envy in a dream?

preview.html: Does an envious person see envy in a dream? Envy is one of the things that many people are exposed to in life, and the Prophet Muhammad forbade it and said: It leads to death. Envy was mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, where God Almighty said in Surat Al-Falaq: From the evil of envy when Envy), and many people ask that they saw envy in a dream, and in this article we will talk in detail about this very interesting topic.Does envy see envy in a dream? If the dreamer sees a group of Jews in a dream, these are signs that he is under the influence of envy and these Amazing visions. If the dreamer sees eyes in a dream, drawn or shaped like them, this means that he is exposed to envy in a great and excessive way. And when the dreamer sees that he is drawing a lot of toxins from snakes or any poisonous animal, this is one of the signs that leads to hatred and intense hatred. Also, Seeing envy in a dream a lot of blood, whether human or animal, means that he has an eye infection and needs to be vaccinated. If the dreamer has been exposed to many changes in his life and his life has changed and he suffers from calamities and severe distress, then this is a sign that he is exposed to severe envy. Many scholars argue that the dreamer Yawning excessively and continuously, this is a sign of magic and envy. And when the sleeper sees in a dream the eyes of magic doors in abundance, this indicates intense envy and the highest permanence in memories of morning and evening and fortification. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the dreamer of an envious person leads to exposure to many problems and worries. If the dreamer sees that there is a group of people who are jealous of you, this means that the dreamer will go through a period full of difficulties and obstacles. Secrets of Dream InterpretationThe expert includes a team of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access, type an online pageSecrets of Dream Interpretation on Google. Symbols that indicate envy in a dreamThere are several symbols that show the extent to which the dreamer is susceptible to envy in reality and they are listed below:If the dreamer sees in a dream the letter of an eye or sees its evil shape, whether it is for a person or an animal, it symbolizes Envy and exposure to the evil eye. And when the dreamer sees in a dream the grave and his eyes turn into excessive envy, and the Messenger of God Muhammad mentioned that envy puts a young man into the grave. And when the dreamer sees in a dream that there is a person he does not love in reality who is looking at him with intense hatred, this means that he suffers from envy. It is necessary to perform the legitimate Rukia. Also, seeing a well in a dream leads to intense envy and she may suffer from depression or extreme loneliness. If a girl sees black cats in a dream with red or yellow eyes, this indicates intense envy. Seeing a black crow and a kite in a dream It symbolizes the envy that tires a person in his life. Symbols in a dream refer to the eye. One of the symbols that express an eye injury is seeing a tightly tied knot in a dream and not being able to untie it. Also, when the sleeper sees braided and tangled threads in a dream, this is a sign of an eye injury. If the sleeper sees glasses or a hill

title: Interpretation of a dream about a white mouse

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a white mouse in a dream for one girl: Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream indicates the date of her approaching engagement or marriage. If you see a white mouse in an unmarried girl’s dream, this means that she has good morals and a good reputation among the people and those around her, including her friends, colleagues, and family. If an unmarried girl sees a white mouse in a dream, it means that she is speaking badly to someone. A white mouse in an unmarried girl’s dream is an indication that there are people around her who bear her grudges. And I hate her and show her love and she must take care of them or even avoid them. Their harm will go away. Seeing a white mouse in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the entry of new friends into her life. A dead white mouse in a dream of an unmarried, engaged girl indicates that there is a problem between her and her fiancé, which may lead to the engagement being broken. Seeing a white mouse in a dream for a woman Unmarried is a sign of fear and intense anxiety about things in her life that may happen in reality. Killing a white rat in a dream for a single girl is a sign of getting rid of the problems, difficulties and worries that she faces in her life or of getting rid of her enemies who await her with intrigues and misfortunes and who harbor hatred and malice. A mouse entering an unmarried girl’s house in a dream is a sign of achieving her long-awaited goals and aspirations, God willing. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a white mouse in a dream for a married woman. Hearing the sound of a white mouse in a married woman’s dream. An indication that he is going through a period. Problems, obstacles and crises. From it you will be liberated and live quietly and be in peace soon, God willing. A white mouse is beaten to death in a married woman’s dream. An indication that she is getting rid of the problems and enemies who are waiting for her through machinations. Raising a white mouse in a married woman’s dream is an indication that she is adopting A sound way to raise and raise her children. A gray mouse in a married woman’s dream indicates her intense love for gossip and gossip around her. It also indicates a lack of confidence in herself because she is an unstable woman. Interpretation of seeing a white mouse in a dream about a man and its meaningIf a man kills a mouse in a dream, this indicates He will get rid of his financial crisis. The situation is difficult, and God has provided him with good and abundant food in the near future, God willing. Whereas if a man sees a white rat in a dream trying to bite him, he cannot do so. This is an indication that he is going through problems and difficulties without causing significant harm or damage. Loss. Seeing a rat or a white mouse in a man’s dream indicates the presence of a woman with bad morals in that man’s life. Or it refers to the bad deeds and prohibitions that a person does and he must repent to God and ask for His forgiveness. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a mouse in a dream for a woman A single woman, a married woman, and a man. The meaning of seeing a white mouse in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a white mouse in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will give birth to a beautiful and lovely child. It is a strong indication that the baby will be a male, God willing. Chasing a white mouse in a dream

title: Interpretation of a beggar in a dream A beggar in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a beggar, a beggar, for the unmarried, for the married, for pregnant women, for divorced women, according to Ibn Shirin. Interpretation of the dream of beggar by Ibn Sirin is a sign of psychological exhaustion and narrow-mindedness, and in the interpretation it is spiritual or existential poverty, and the beggar is a sign of hypocrisy and lies, and it is said that it is a symbol of deception and cunning, and in a person’s dream be sad. The sadness of a beggar in an unmarried woman’s dream is if she sees a girl in her dream as if a beggar is approaching her and asking her for money or food, and if she is kind and feeds him, her worries will go away and despair will disappear before she disappears. But if she sees that she is being reprimanded or treated harshly and arrogantly, then this is a bad expression, because the dream Indicates an arrogant and emotionally unbalanced personality. A beggar in a married dream. If a woman sees that she is talking or sitting with a miserable beggar or a beggar wearing old and worn out rags, then this is her interpretation that her luck in money is small and the dream may indicate the opposite if the beggar is handsome or elegant and not good. In the beggar who blocks her path, holds her hand, or speaks bad words to her. As for the married woman who receives the beggar in her home, honors him, and feeds him, she or he will meet goodness, especially if the beggar is satisfied and satisfied and does not submit to his request or urging. The beggar in the visions symbolizes the aggravation of debts, It is bankruptcy or the like, especially if he is lame, blind, one-eyed, or accused. They also said that the beggar is disturbed. If a woman generally sees that someone she knows is begging in the streets (his clothes are torn and his face is pale), then the same person may suffer from problems or illness. Or illness. This interpretation applies to pregnant women, widows, and divorced women. Marrying a beggar or beggar in a dream. If a girl or woman sees that she is marrying a beggar, this means that she is suffering from great emotional deficiency or deprivation, and the dream can also indicate feelings of despair and hopelessness that control the woman’s mind, may To be an expression of good fortune after fatigue and worries. When one sees himself begging in a dream, if the beggar is caused by poverty or need, then the person who sees himself begging in a dream is living in a state of financial distress, and may soon be freed from it. Whoever begs in a dream without a convincing reason, that is, without the need for money or food, is in reality a person who lacks some values, principles, or positive ideas in life, and his outlook on existence is bleak and his pursuit in life is minimal, tending to rest and unemployment more than to work, giving, and giving. If you see yourself in a dream as a poor beggar, this foretells embarrassing events for you. If you see beggars in a dream, this foretells that someone will ask for your help and generosity. If you dream that you are homeless, This portends poverty and deprivation. Seeing homeless people predicts a disease that will invade your city. To dream that you are giving or giving to a homeless person, this foretells that your generosity and chivalry will be appreciated and admired by others. Interpretation of knocking on the door in a dream - YouTube

Interpretation of the dream of beggar by Ibn Sirin is a sign of psychological exhaustion and narrow-mindedness, and in the interpretation it is spiritual or existential poverty, and the beggar is a sign of hypocrisy and lies, and it is said that it is a symbol of deception and cunning, and in a person’s dream be sad. The sadness of a beggar in an unmarried woman’s dream is if she sees a girl in her dream as if a beggar is approaching her and asking her for money or food, and if she is kind and feeds him, her worries will go away and despair will disappear before she disappears. But if she sees that she is being reprimanded or treated harshly and arrogantly, then this is a bad expression, because the dream Indicates an arrogant and emotionally unbalanced personality. A beggar in a married dream. If a woman sees that she is talking or sitting with a miserable beggar or a beggar wearing old and worn out rags, then this is her interpretation that her luck in money is small and the dream may indicate the opposite if the beggar is handsome or elegant and not good. In the beggar who blocks her path, holds her hand, or speaks bad words to her. As for the married woman who receives the beggar in her home, honors him, and feeds him, she or he will meet goodness, especially if the beggar is satisfied and satisfied and does not submit to his request or urging. The beggar in the visions symbolizes the aggravation of debts, It is bankruptcy or the like, especially if he is lame, blind, one-eyed, or accused. They also said that the beggar is disturbed. If a woman generally sees that someone she knows is begging in the streets (his clothes are torn and his face is pale), then the same person may suffer from problems or illness. Or illness. This interpretation applies to pregnant women, widows, and divorced women. Marrying a beggar or beggar in a dream. If a girl or woman sees that she is marrying a beggar, this means that she is suffering from great emotional deficiency or deprivation, and the dream can also indicate feelings of despair and hopelessness that control the woman’s mind, may To be an expression of good fortune after fatigue and worries. When one sees himself begging in a dream, if the beggar is caused by poverty or need, then the person who sees himself begging in a dream is living in a state of financial distress, and may soon be freed from it. Whoever begs in a dream without a convincing reason, that is, without the need for money or food, is in reality a person who lacks some values, principles, or positive ideas in life, and his outlook on existence is bleak and his pursuit in life is minimal, tending to rest and unemployment more than to work, giving, and giving. If you see yourself in a dream as a poor beggar, this foretells embarrassing events for you. If you see beggars in a dream, this foretells that someone will ask for your help and generosity. If you dream that you are homeless, This portends poverty and deprivation. Seeing homeless people predicts a disease that will invade your city. To dream that you are giving or giving to a homeless person, this foretells that your generosity and chivalry will be appreciated and admired by others.
